message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects its true value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $13,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to my original price. Would you consider $13,750?
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $13,500 for the product.
